reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent three nights at the Angel Inn during the EAA Convention. I can't find enough words to express our satisfaction and gratitude to Kathy's amazing professionalism and welcoming attitude. The location is perfect and the house is beautifully decorated. The Gabriel room where we stayed at is cozy and very comfortable. Some people may find the restroom too small but we come from Europe where hotel rooms are tiny so we were not really shocked. Besides, the Jacuzzi is awesome! Kathy served a wonderful breakfast that, in addition to being different every day, brought me memories of my childhood (cakes, pastries, hmmm). In the evening, we were indulged with a nice glass of wine and some crackers and cheese, which we could take to our room or to the beautiful porch in the lakefront.
reviews.title: Sweet...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really, we wanted to keep the secret to ourselves but we also want that Kathy and her husband stay in the business of providing guests with an unforgettable experience.
reviews.title: Can't Wait to go back again! Great place to stay!!!!

likes.liked: — Gorgeous lakefront view - enjoyable all hours of the day, especially with breakfast!
likes.disliked: — Wifi works on the ground/entrance floor, but not in the room - not really a problem, though!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Angel Inn for our weekend honeymoon in Green Lake, WI. This was our first bed and breakfast experience and were a little unsure what to expect. We wanted something quiet and intimate where we could just enjoy eachother and relax. The Angel Inn surpassed our expectations and gave us everything we had hoped for! Kathy and David are very, very nice people who made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in but also gave us the personal space we craved to really enjoy our honeymoon. It was perfect!
reviews.title: Heavenly!

likes.liked: — Friendly innkeepers and overall grace and charm of the inn.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast provided in the mornings was wonderful with lots of fresh fruit and coffee. We woke up in the mornings to the smell of bacon and eggs cooking and really enjoyed eating our wonderful and delicious breakfast outside on the back porch just watching the serene activity of Green Lake. They even made us heart -shaped french toast to celebrate our honeymoon! So sweet and much appreciated!
reviews.title: Stay Here....You Won't Regret It!

reviews.text: I just returned home from a stay at the Angel Inn Bed & Breakfast. The Inn was beautiful! I wish I could have spent more time there...I didn't want to leave. Sitting on lake property, the views are spectacular. It felt very relaxing and serene. I enjoyed my breakfast (which were delightfully delicious) out by water every morning...what a great way to start the day! The rooms were beautifully decorated, very clean, fresh and new. To unwind in the ultra bath was a relaxing way to end the day. The owners, Kathy and Dave were truly gracious and very hospitable. This was a great B & B. Best of the best! My #1 pick of places to stay in Green Lake and the surrounding area! ...Debra S. Denver, Colorado
reviews.title: Green Lake's Finest!
